description: I am not into this type of game but i think for a GNOME Game it could be more visually descriptive than that
I don't think a fresh installation of Debian with GNOME should include this game.
I dont think it should be preinstalled in Debian.

you ever play a game and you feel like you're slowly crumbling away and losing brain cells

that's kind of how i feel

i mean it's well put together don't get me wrong its just a bore :/
This app is great - it is reminisce of the current classic game; it's recommended for the single player and can play with family. Superb!
summary: Just like classic dice game of Yahtzee

description:
Honestly, if you're looking for a game with graphics, keep moving. If you hate Yahtzee or simple dice games, keep moving. That said, if you like Yahtzee/Yacht/whatever you call it, this is a fine and easy version of it that comes with some simulated opponents. I do wish it had some modes like Triple Yahtzee for example, but there is a creative variation where you have to match colors too, something you can't really do with actual dice.

Anywho, I'm typing more than it's worth. It's fine and a simple time-waster. Keep simple expectations and you'll have a simple and nice 5 minutes clicking it.
summary: Yahtzee with a creative alternate mode

description: waste of time - why in standard installation?
